title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\SerializedPolicyTag
name: SerializedPolicyTag
description:
A nested protocol buffer that represents a policy tag and all its descendants.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.SerializedPolicyTag

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.policy_tag
params.description: Resource name of the policy tag. This field is ignored when calling ImportTaxonomies.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Required. Display name of the policy tag. At most 200 bytes when encoded in UTF-8.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Description of the serialized policy tag. At most 2000 bytes when encoded in UTF-8. If not set, defaults to an empty description.

params.name: data.child_policy_tags
params.description: Children of the policy tag, if any.
